name: Outdoor Gallery Series Presents: Glitch Video Loop for modal_plane
description: In a scape which is the mind from a dream spilled over into the cracks of a parallel waking life where IRL and AFK are one, you will see monitor screens looping glitch art used for a modal_plane music video. Repurposed by the artist Sky Goodman and now adding a vibe to this space where you can engage with a sentient blob or walk through a door of perception. The end goal is always the same, that you could and maybe would...be happy here.
